title.full: BLASTER AND MORIONブラスターアンドモリオン
title.reduced: BLASTER AND MORIONブラスターアンドモリオン

description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. BLASTER AND MORION is a twin-stick shooter where you struggle to fend off violent attack of strange enemies. Experience 7 stages. Copyright 2010 MUKAGOSOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT
